title: Handle a Property Damage Claim from a Third Party
description: A person claims your insured driver backed into their car in a parking lot and is filing a claim against your insured's policy.

tasks.description: Gather information from the third-party claimant and identify your insured's policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster creates a new claim and links it to the correct policyholder.

tasks.description: Contact the insured policyholder to get their statement about the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster speaks with the insured, who confirms they did back into the other car.

tasks.description: Accept liability and arrange for an appraiser to inspect the claimant's vehicle.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster accepts liability and schedules an inspection of the third-party's vehicle.
